alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 11:10AM CDT until March 18 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...ACCUMULATING SNOW AND GUSTY WINDS THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... .Lake-enhanced snow showers will continue to affect Vilas County through Saturday morning. A lull in the accumulations is expected through early in the evening, but snow showers will increase and become heavy at times late tonight. Additional accumulations of 3 to 8 inches are anticipated, with the highest amounts in northwest Vilas County. Northwest winds will gust to 25 to 30 mph at times, resulting in patchy blowing and drifting snow in open areas. Hazardous travel conditions are anticipated, especially late tonight into Saturday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow showers, becoming heavy at times from late tonight into Saturday morning. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 8 inches, with the highest amounts over northwest Vilas County. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph, and producing patchy blowing and drifting snow in open areas. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially late tonight into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
